extendedInfo.description: enter menstruationforecast of period automatically or via setting own cycle lengthperiod reminderpill intake reminderrecord complaints and their intensity notesnotesdocumentation of sexual interactionfertile days (not capable as contraception)discreet namepassword protecteddata import/export

reviews.comment: Works great! I\'ve had it for over a year and the cycle predictor is awesomely accurate. Would absolutely recommend as the best menstrual calendar app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Paid for it
reviews.comment: Its not letting me up date the cycle calculation. I\'ve used for about a year now. There were far more kinks than there are now, but still its not a 4 nor 5 star app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I would like to see predicated cycle dates, more moods, and be able to enter my weight at least...this app needs a lot of work...DO NOT PURCHASE
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like the discrete icon. Would prefer a lighter shade of pink for readability.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love privacy of app. Would suggest spotting option maybe different color butterfly
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app but I would love a start and end period note.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Warning
reviews.comment: This is a great app if you only ever plan to have one phone. However if you upgrade your phone after a couple of years you will lose your original data. In my experience, it isn\'t possible to import saved data from the sd card and the response from customer service is pretty much useless. Ran beautifully on my Samsung Vibrant but can\'t import to the S3.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted and needed!
reviews.comment: Tracks exactly what I want tracked.  Nothing more, nothing less.  Doesn\'t take up much space on my phone, and so far, it\'s worked perfectly.  10/11/2012 EDIT = Started having problems with the password, not exactly working on my phone any longer.  No response whatsoever from the app developer(s).  Hate to uninstall, but I need a little privacy with this app,  Guess I\'ll try another app and see how it goes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app! & the butterflies are so much better than dots :0) thank u for inventing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: absolutely love this app! does everything it says! i would like to see a \"spotting\" option also
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Horrible app pillreminder only worked ifyou turn ur phn off everydayperiod reminder nvrworked
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Having a day of ovulation would make this app. Perfect
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Using for over a year. Found the cycle prediction very accurate. Add note UI is clunky. Wish it would sync w Google calendar. Would purchase again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: awesome app ... please add export to email!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Bought it and won\'t show my fertile days or my next cycle predictions....droidx, uninstall
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It would be nice to see a \"spotting\" option for flow. Also cervical mucous and basal body temp. Overall its the best out compared to pink pad(pre)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Just started using it. It wont accept the \"light\" flow button. Had to use \"normal\" instead...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I\'m liking this so far. Love the fact that we can track moods and have a comment section. The ability to print this out is helpful, too. DroidX
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is great when it works. I have contacted the maker to ask him to please fix it and i am still have problems with it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Using on MyTouch 4g, I purchased this app because I wanted 2 have a pill reminder & period tracker all n 1. This thing barely remembers 2 remind me.
reviews.author: A Google User
